On the other hand, "Alex in Wonderland" follows a filmmaker as he navigates his personal and professional life while fantasizing about movie scenarios, with appearances from Jeanne Moreau and Ellen Burstyn. Enjoy exploring these engaging narratives!

If you're interested in action and suspense with elements of sound, "Blow Out" might also be appealing to you. This thriller follows a movie sound recordist who accidentally records evidence of a murder, putting himself in danger. Starring John Travolta and Nancy Allen, it's definitely worth checking out!
